exception.name: Linking exception to LGPL 2.1 or later

text.p: As a special exception, if you link the code in this file with files compiled with a GNU compiler to produce an executable, that does not cause the resulting executable to be covered by the GNU Lesser General Public License. This exception does not however invalidate any other reasons why the executable file might be covered by the GNU Lesser General Public License. This exception applies to code released by its copyright holders in files containing the exception.
